SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LobbyController
public class LobbyController extends Object
Handles registration to multiple lobbies for concurrent play.
LobbyController receives RequestLobby, RecoverLobby, CreateLobby and JoinLobby messages.
It always directly responds to each of these messages with a ServerResponseMessage, both in case of success and failure.
LobbyController constitutes a single synchronization lock, through which all login actions have to go through, and also single-handedly controls the controller mapping on the LocalServer.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static final record 
    LobbyController.Lobby
    Lobby record, representing both recovery and normal lobbies.
    static final record 
    LobbyController.LobbyView
    LobbyView is a serializable version of Lobby to be sent to the client for information.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static LobbyController getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the running LobbyController.
      Returns:
      LobbyController instance

    • setServer

      public void setServer(LocalServer server)
      Set the server reference, only possible once.
      This is needed because the LobbyController has to pass mappings to the server once the game starts.
      Parameters:
      server - Server reference

    • endGame

      public void endGame(int lobbyID)
      Quietly remove all records of a Lobby from the server.
      Gets rid of all the mappings and the saved model.
      Does not notify clients in any way.
      Parameters:
      lobbyID - Lobby to stop tracking

    • update

      public boolean update(Client client, ViewMessage<?> msg)
      Forward a ViewMessage to the LobbyController.
      Executes the corresponding onMessage() method if it exists.
      This method is synchronized over the LobbyController instance only if it's a message it can handle.
      Parameters:
      client - Client that sent the message
      msg - Message to forward
      Returns:
      True if the message was forwarded successfully, false otherwise

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(RequestLobbyMessage msg)
      Return the list of lobbies to the client
      Parameters:
      msg - Lobby parameters

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(RecoverLobbyMessage msg)
      Add the client to a recovery lobby.
      If the lobby is full, start the game.
      Parameters:
      msg - Lobby parameters

      Create a new lobby.
      Parameters:

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(JoinLobbyMessage msg)
      Join the chosen lobby.
      If the lobby is full, start the game.

    • nicknameTaken

      public static boolean nicknameTaken(String nickname)
      Check if a nickname is already taken, looking at both recovery and normal lobbies
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname to check
      Returns:
      True if the nickname is already present in any lobby
